Making Out is a British television show, shown by the BBC between 1991 and 1989.

The collection, developed by Franc Roddam, written by Debbie Horsfield, mixed humor and play in its portrayal of those women who labored on the factory floor in New Lyne Electronics in Manchester, tackling the personal lives of their characters as well as wider problems of downturn, redundancy and retrenchment while the factory experiences various disasters and takeovers.

The music for this show was composed by New Order.  The major theme for the show is that an adaptation of this song"Vanishing Point".  There is a combination with this song referred to as the Creating Out Mix.
